resources.string: Search for an artist and you can create a playlist based on their most recent setlists
Enter an artist name to Search for.
The playlist was not created because an error occurred.
The playlist was not created because the artist:
was not found on your device.
The playlist was not created because none of the songs selected were found on the device.

The purpose of this app is to help you organise the music on your device when you are planing to go see a gig. Using this app you can create a playlist on your device of an artist\'s most played songs from their last few performances. This app uses the data provided by setlist.fm and Musicbrainz to create this playlist using the songs that are already stored on your device.
First enter a name for your playlist.
Then uncheck any songs that you do not want added to the playlist.
Finally click the "Create Playlist" button to create the playlist.
